game.name: Im the one
game.description:
Challenges always come as a big threat no matter whether you are driving a car on a busy street or a long highway! This time we have got you covered with a brand new adventure game where you have to deal with multiple challenges while manoeuvring a red colour car. Are you ready friends to make the most out of the online gaming world? If yes, then Im the one can be the right choice for you to make you learn how to deal with the biggest challenges with a cool mind. 
Your objective in this HTML5 escaping game is to help the red of lane number 1 reach safely to its destination that is the top portion of the screen. Put your fingers fast on your mouse or the screen of your mobile phone and get ready to prevent it from the dangerous bullets that will keep coming to your car from the walls. These bullets only want to destroy you and stop you from achieving your goal. 
Reach your goal safely and do not forget to save the number of times you have won during the fun time! The one touch control, easy-to-play controls, and cool graphics will help you to keep entertained for hours, even for days. Our website is full of free adventure games for boys that are playable on multiple devices and latest browsers. No matter whether you are a boy or a girl, the seamless gameplay of this cool skill game will offer you fun in the unlimited amount.
